definitions.body: small, insignificant;—abs. ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 2:19 +; cstr. [[קְטׂן]] 2Ch 21:17;—f., pl. and sf. supplied by [[קָטָן]];—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of youth = young, ´[[נַעַר קּ]]: 1Sa 20:35, 1Ki 3:7, 2Ki 5:14, Is 11:6; = younger of two brothers, Ge 48:19 (E) Ju Jdg 1:13, Jdg 3:9 (+ [[מִן]] comp.); ´[[הַקּ]]: youngest brother Ge 42:13 + 10 t. Gn (JE), son Ju Jdg 9:5, 2Ch 22:1, so [[קְטׂן בָּנׇיו]] 2Ch 21:17; + [[נדול]] = young and old (v. [[קָטָן]]
), i.e. everybodty Ge 19:11 (J), 1Sa 5:9, 1Sa 30:2 + (of pers. and things) v:1Sa 30:19.

= unimportant, things, Ex 18:22, Ex 18:26 (E), 1Sa 20:2 (all opp. [[גדול]]); pers.,=feeble Am 7:2, Am 7:5; = insignificant Je 49:15, Ob:Ob 2 (both ‖[[בָּזוּי ]]), Is 60:22 (‖[[חָעִיר ]]); [[בְּעֵינֶיךָ]] ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 15:17; esp. + [[גׇּדוֹל]] = low and high, + everybody, De 1:17, 1Ki 22:31 = 2Ch 18:30, Je 8:10, Job 3:19, +8 t.—Vid. also [[קָטָן]].
